c1.name: Agate Ryuukin
c1.descriptionRaw:
The Aurous Blaze created by <color=#FFD780FF>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color> lasts for an extra 4s.
Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.
c1.description:
The Aurous Blaze created by Ryuukin Saxifrage lasts for an extra 4s.
Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.

c2.name: A Procession of Bonfires
c2.descriptionRaw:
When Yoimiya's <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 6s.
This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.
c2.description:
When Yoimiya's Pyro DMG scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% Pyro DMG Bonus for 6s.
This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.

c3.name: Trickster's Flare
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Niwabi Fire-Dance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Pyrotechnic Professional
c4.descriptionRaw: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, <color=#FFD780FF>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color>'s CD is decreased by 1.2s.
c4.description: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, Niwabi Fire-Dance's CD is decreased by 1.2s.

c5.name: A Summer Festival's Eve
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Ryuukin Saxifrage by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
c6.descriptionRaw: During <color=#FFD780FF>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color>, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Blazing Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.
c6.description: During Niwabi Fire-Dance, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Blazing Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.
